unnormalised: Hey folks! Ever scrolled through Instagram and seen your favorite influencer, let's say, Masoom Minawala, rocking a trendy Kurti from a brand you know? That, my friends, is the magic of brand collaborations in action!
normalised: Hey folks! Ever scrolled through Instagram and seen your favorite influencer, let's say, Masoom Minawala, rocking a trendy Kurti from a brand you know? That, my friends, is the magic of brand collaborations in action!

unnormalised: In the world of Social Media & Influencer Marketing, collaborations are HUGE. It’s like that epic Diwali party at Sharmaji's house – everyone benefits! Brands get exposure to a new audience, influencers get to create cool content and earn some Rs., and *we* get to discover amazing products and services. Win-win-win!
normalised: In the world of Social Media and Influencer Marketing, collaborations are HUGE. It’s like that epic Diwali party at Sharmaji's house – everyone benefits! Brands get exposure to a new audience, influencers get to create cool content and earn some rupees, and *we* get to discover amazing products and services. Win-win-win!

unnormalised: Why are collaborations so effective? Simple. People trust people more than they trust ads. If Virat Kohli says a particular brand of cricket bat is the best, chances are, aspiring cricketers in Delhi are going to take notice. It’s all about that personal connection and relatable content.
normalised: Why are collaborations so effective? Simple. People trust people more than they trust ads. If Virat Kohli says a particular brand of cricket bat is the best, chances are, aspiring cricketers in Delhi are going to take notice. It’s all about that personal connection and relatable content.

unnormalised: Think about it. A small business in Jaipur, crafting beautiful block-printed textiles, can partner with a travel blogger exploring Rajasthan. The blogger showcases the textiles, the business gains visibility beyond the local market, and everyone goes home happy! This is so much more effective than just running ads on TV, especially reaching the younger crowd who are glued to their phones.
normalised: Think about it. A small business in Jaipur, crafting beautiful block-printed textiles, can partner with a travel blogger exploring Rajasthan. The blogger showcases the textiles, the business gains visibility beyond the local market, and everyone goes home happy! This is so much more effective than just running ads on T V, especially reaching the younger crowd who are glued to their phones.

unnormalised: Of course, successful collaborations require careful planning. You can’t just pair any influencer with any brand. It’s gotta be a good fit. A luxury car brand wouldn't collab with someone who mostly posts about budget travel, right? Authenticity is key! Remember that campaign gone wrong on 26/01/2015 because the brand didn't do their research? Ouch!
normalised: Of course, successful collaborations require careful planning. You can’t just pair any influencer with any brand. It’s gotta be a good fit. A luxury car brand wouldn't collab with someone who mostly posts about budget travel, right? Authenticity is key! Remember that campaign gone wrong on twenty sixth january two thousand and fifteen because the brand didn't do their research? Ouch!

unnormalised: Looking to get into brand collaborations? My advice? Start small. Reach out to micro-influencers in your niche. They are often more engaged and passionate. And always, always, always be transparent. Disclose your partnerships clearly. Trust is earned, not given.
normalised: Looking to get into brand collaborations? My advice? Start small. Reach out to micro-influencers in your niche. They are often more engaged and passionate. And always, always, always be transparent. Disclose your partnerships clearly. Trust is earned, not given.

unnormalised: Now go out there and find your perfect collab match! Maybe you’ll be the next big success story we’re talking about at the next Influencer Marketing Summit at IIM Ahmedabad on 14/11/2024 at 09:00 hrs! Just remember to track your KPIs (Key Performance Indicators) after the campaign launches to see how much traffic it drives. Aim for that 100 km jump in brand awareness, yeah? Cheers!
normalised: Now go out there and find your perfect collab match! Maybe you’ll be the next big success story we’re talking about at the next Influencer Marketing Summit at I I M Ahmedabad on fourteenth november two thousand and twenty four at nine o'clock hours! Just remember to track your K P Is (Key Performance Indicators) after the campaign launches to see how much traffic it drives. Aim for that one hundred kilometer jump in brand awareness, yeah? Cheers!
